Notes.success: Éxito Si estabas buscando criaturas, cualquier @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf] {Undetected} criatura contra la que hayas tenido éxito se convierte en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC] {Hidden} de ti en lugar de @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf] {Undetected}, y cualquier @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC] {Hidden} criatura contra la que hayas tenido éxito se convierte en @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]. Si estabas buscando un objeto, aprendes su ubicación u obtienes una pista de su paradero, según lo determine el DJ.

Seek.Title: Buscar

SenseDirection.Description:
Using the stars, the position of the sun, traits of the geography or flora, or the behavior of fauna, you can stay oriented in the wild. Typically, you attempt a Survival check only once per day, but some environments or changes might necessitate rolling more often. The GM determines the DC and how long this activity takes (usually just a minute or so). More unusual locales or those you're unfamiliar with might require you to have a minimum proficiency rank to Sense Direction. Without a compass, you take a –2 item penalty to checks to Sense Direction.

Éxito crítico You get an excellent sense of where you are. If you are in an environment with cardinal directions, you know them exactly.
Éxito You gain enough orientation to avoid becoming hopelessly lost. If you are in an environment with cardinal directions, you have a sense of those directions.

Sense Direction Tasks

No entrenado determine a cardinal direction using the sun

Entrenado find an overgrown path in a forest

Experto navigate a hedge maze

Maestro navigate a byzantine labyrinth or relatively featureless desert

Legendario navigate an ever-changing dream realm

Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico Tienes una excelente idea de dónde estás. Si estás en un entorno con puntos cardinales, los conoces exactamente.
Notes.success: Éxito Ganas suficiente orientación para evitar perderte irremediablemente. Si se encuentra en un entorno con direcciones cardinales, tiene una idea de esas direcciones.

SampleTasks.Untrained: determine a cardinal direction using the sun
SampleTasks.Trained: find an overgrown path in a forest
SampleTasks.Master: navigate a byzantine labyrinth or relatively featureless desert

SenseDirection.Title: Sentido de dirección

SenseMotive.Description:
You try to tell whether a creature's behavior is abnormal. Choose one creature, and assess it for odd body language, signs of nervousness, and other indicators that it might be trying to deceive someone. The GM attempts a single secret Perception check for you and compares the result to the Deception DC of the creature, the DC of a spell affecting the creature's mental state, or another appropriate DC determined by the GM. You typically can't try to Sense the Motive of the same creature again until the situation changes significantly.

Éxito crítico You determine the creature's true intentions and get a solid idea of any mental magic affecting it.
Éxito You can tell whether the creature is behaving normally, but you don't know its exact intentions or what magic might be affecting it.
Fallo You detect what a deceptive creature wants you to believe. If they're not being deceptive, you believe they're behaving normally.
Fallo crítico You get a false sense of the creature's intentions.

Notes.criticalFailure: Fallo crítico Obtienes una falsa sensación de las intenciones de la criatura.
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico Determinas las verdaderas intenciones de la criatura y obtienes una idea sólida de cualquier magia mental que la afecte.
Notes.failure: Fallo Detectas lo que una criatura engañosa quiere que creas. Si no están siendo engañosos, crees que se están comportando normalmente.
Notes.success: Éxito Puedes saber si la criatura se está comportando normalmente, pero no sabes sus intenciones exactas o qué magia podría estar afectándola.

SenseMotive.Title: Motivo sentido

Shove.Description:
Requirements You have at least one hand free. The target can't be more than one size larger than you.

You push a creature away from you. Attempt an Athletics check against your target's Fortitude DC.

Critical Success You push your target up to 10 feet away from you. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} after it, but you must move the same distance and in the same direction.
Success You push your target back 5 feet. You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride} after it, but you must move the same distance and in the same direction.
Critical Failure You lose your balance, fall, and land @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Notes.criticalFailure: Fallo crítico Pierdes el equilibrio, caes y aterrizas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60] {Prone} .
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico Empujas a tu oponente hasta 10 pies de distancia de ti. Puedes caminar tras él, pero debes moverte la misma distancia y en la misma dirección.
Notes.success: Éxito Empujas a tu oponente hacia atrás 5 pies. Puedes caminar tras él, pero debes moverte la misma distancia y en la misma dirección.

Shove.Title: Empujón

Sneak.Description:
Puedes intentar moverte a otro lugar mientras pasas desapercibido o pasas desapercibido. Avanza hasta la mitad de tu velocidad. (Puedes usar Sigilo mientras excavas, trepas, vuelas o nadas en lugar de caminar si tienes el tipo de movimiento correspondiente; debes moverte a la mitad de esa velocidad).

Si una criatura no te detecta y es imposible para esa criatura para observarte (para una criatura típica, esto incluye cuando eres invisible, el observador está cegado o estás enoscuridad y la criatura no puede ver en la oscuridad), por cualquier fallo crítico que saques en una prueba de Sigilo, obtienes un fallo en su lugar. También continúas sin ser detectado si pierdes la cobertura o una mayor cobertura o ya no estás oculto de dicha criatura.

Al final de tu movimiento, el DJ tira tu chequeo de Sigilo en secreto y compara el resultado con la CD de Percepción de cada criatura de la que estabas oculto o que no te detectó al comienzo de tu movimiento. Si usted tienecobertura o mayor cobertura de la criatura a lo largo de tu zancada, obtienes la bonificación de circunstancia de +2 de cobertura (o +4 de cobertura mayor) a tu prueba de Sigilo. Debido a que se está mudando, el aumento de bonificación de Cubrirse no se aplica. No puedes tirar contra una criatura si, al final de tu movimiento, no estás oculto ni tienes cobertura o mayor cobertura contra ella. Automáticamente eres observado por tal criatura.

Éxito No eres detectado por la criatura durante tu movimiento y permaneces sin ser detectado por la criatura al final del mismo. Te vuelven observado tan pronto como haces algo que no sea Esconderse, Escabullirse o Caminar. Si intentas Golpear a una criatura, la criatura permanece desprevenida contra ese ataque, y luego eres observado. Si haces cualquier otra cosa, te observan justo antes de actuar, a menos que el DJ determine lo contrario. El DJ podría permitirte realizar una acción particularmente discreta sin sernotado, posiblemente requiriendo otra prueba de Sigilo. Si hablas o haces un ruido fuerte deliberado, te escondes en lugar de pasar desapercibido. Si una criatura usa Seek y, como resultado, te ocultas, debes Sigilo si quieres que esa criatura no te detecte nuevamente.
Fallo Un sonido revelador u otra señal delata tu posición, aunque sigues sin ser visto. Estás oculto de la criatura a lo largo de tu movimiento y permaneces así.
Fallo crítico ¡Estás descubierto! Eres observado por la criatura a lo largo de tu movimiento y permaneces así. Si eres invisible y estabas oculto a la criatura, en lugar de ser observado, estás oculto durante todo tu movimiento y permaneces así.

Notes.criticalFailure: Fallo crítico ¡Estás descubierto! Eres observado por la criatura a lo largo de tu movimiento y permaneces así. Si eres invisible y estabas oculto a la criatura, en lugar de ser observado, estás oculto durante todo tu movimiento y permaneces así.
Notes.failure: Fallo Un sonido revelador u otra señal delata tu posición, aunque sigues sin ser visto. Estás oculto de la criatura a lo largo de tu movimiento y permaneces así.
Notes.success: Éxito No eres detectado por la criatura durante tu movimiento y permaneces sin ser detectado por la criatura al final del mismo.

Sneak.Title: Furtivo

Squeeze.Description:
You contort yourself to squeeze through a space so small you can barely fit through. This action is for exceptionally small spaces; many tight spaces are difficult terrain that you can move through more quickly and without a check.

Éxito crítico You squeeze through the tight space in 1 minute per 10 feet of squeezing.
Éxito You squeeze through in 1 minute per 5 feet.
Fallo crítico You become stuck in the tight space. While you're stuck, you can spend 1 minute attempting another Acrobatics check at the same DC. Any result on that check other than a critical failure causes you to become unstuck.

Sample Squeeze Tasks

Entrenado space barely fitting your shoulders

Maestro space barely fitting your head

Notes.criticalFailure: Fallo crítico Te quedas atascado en un espacio reducido. Mientras estás atascado, puedes pasar 1 minuto intentando otra prueba de Acrobacias con la misma CD. Cualquier resultado en esa prueba que no sea un fallo crítico hace que te despegues.
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico Atraviesas el espacio reducido en 1 minuto por 10 pies de presión.
Notes.success: Éxito Pasas en 1 minuto cada 5 pies.

Squeeze.Title: Estrujar

Steal.Description:
You try to take a small object from another creature without being noticed. Typically, you can Steal only an object of negligible Bulk, and you automatically fail if the creature who has the object is in combat or on guard.

Attempt a Thievery check to determine if you successfully Steal the object. The DC to Steal is usually the Perception DC of the creature wearing the object. This assumes the object is worn but not closely guarded (like a loosely carried pouch filled with coins, or an object within such a pouch). If the object is in a pocket or similarly protected, you take a –5 penalty to your Thievery check. The GM might increase the DC of your check if the nature of the object makes it harder to steal (such as a very small item in a large pack, or a sheet of parchment mixed in with other documents).

You might also need to compare your Thievery check result against the Perception DCs of observers other than the person wearing the object. The GM may increase the Perception DCs of these observers if they're distracted.

Éxito You steal the item without the bearer noticing, or an observer doesn't see you take or attempt to take the item.
Fallo The item's bearer notices your attempt before you can take the object, or an observer sees you take or attempt to take the item. The GM determines the response of any creature that notices your theft.

Notes.failure: Fallo El portador del artículo nota tu intento antes de que puedas tomar el objeto, o un observador ve que tomas o intentas tomar el artículo. El DJ determina la respuesta de cualquier criatura que se dé cuenta de tu robo.
Notes.success: Éxito Robas el objeto sin que el portador se dé cuenta, o un observador no ve que tomas o intentas tomar el objeto.

Steal.Title: Robar

SteelYourResolve.BadArgs: Esta acción debe realizarse con exactamente un personaje o NPC.
SteelYourResolve.Content: ¿Gastar un punto de resolución y recuperar la resistencia?
SteelYourResolve.NoStamina: {name} está cansado y necesita irse a la cama! No quedan puntos de resolución.
SteelYourResolve.RecoverStamina: {name} tiene {ratio} SP y gasta un punto de resolución, recuperando la mitad de su resistencia máxima.
SteelYourResolve.StaminaNotEnabled: La variante Stamina no está habilitada.
SteelYourResolve.Title: Fortalece tu determinación

Step.Description:
You carefully move 5 feet. Unlike most types of movement, Stepping doesn't trigger reactions, such as Attacks of Opportunity, that can be triggered by move actions or upon leaving or entering a square.

You can't Step into difficult terrain, and you can't Step using a Speed other than your land Speed.
Step.Title: Step

Strike.Description:
You attack with a weapon you're wielding or with an unarmed attack, targeting one creature within your reach (for a melee attack) or within range (for a ranged attack). Roll an attack roll using the attack modifier for the weapon or unarmed attack you're using, and compare the result to the target creature's AC to determine the effect.

Critical Success You make a damage roll according to the weapon or unarmed attack and deal double damage.

Success You make a damage roll according to the weapon or unarmed attack and deal damage.

Notes.criticalSuccess: Critical Success You make a damage roll according to the weapon or unarmed attack and deal double damage.
Notes.success: Success You make a damage roll according to the weapon or unarmed attack and deal damage.

Strike.Title: Strike

Subsist.Description:
You try to provide food and shelter for yourself, and possibly others as well, with a standard of living depending on your degree of success. The GM determines the DC based on the nature of the place where you're trying to Subsist. You might need a minimum proficiency rank to Subsist in particularly strange environments. Unlike most downtime activities, you can Subsist after 8 hours or less of exploration, but if you do, you take a –5 penalty.

Éxito crítico You either provide a subsistence living for yourself and one additional creature, or you improve your own food and shelter, granting yourself a comfortable living.
Éxito You find enough food and shelter with basic protection from the elements to provide you a subsistence living.
Fallo You're exposed to the elements and don't get enough food, becoming fatigued until you attain sufficient food and shelter.
Fallo crítico You attract trouble, eat something you shouldn't, or otherwise worsen your situation. You take a –2 circumstance penalty to checks to Subsist for 1 week. You don't find any food at all; if you don't have any stored up, you're in danger of starving or dying of thirst if you continue failing.

Sample Subsist Tasks

No entrenado lush forest with calm weather or large city with plentiful resources

Entrenado typical hillside or village

Experto typical mountains or insular hamlet

Maestro typical desert or city under siege

Legendario barren wasteland or city of undead

Notes.criticalFailure: Fracaso Crítico Atraes problemas, comes algo que no debes, o empeoras tu situación. Recibes una penalización de -2 circunstancias para comprobar Subsistir durante 1 semana. No encuentras comida en absoluto; si no tienes nada almacenado, corres el peligro de morirte de hambre o de sed si sigues fallando. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.wHWWHkjDXmJl4Ia6] {Effect: Adverse Subsist Situation}
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico O te proporcionas un sustento de subsistencia para ti y una criatura adicional, o mejoras tu propia comida y vivienda, otorgándote una vida cómoda.
Notes.failure: Fallo Estás expuesto a los elementos y no obtienes suficiente comida, y te fatigas hasta que obtienes suficiente comida y refugio.
Notes.success: Éxito Encuentra suficiente comida y refugio con protección básica contra los elementos para poder subsistir.

SampleTasks.Untrained: a lush forest with calm weather or a large city with plentiful resources
SampleTasks.Master: typical desert or city under siege
SampleTasks.Legendary: barren wasteland or city of undead

Subsist.Title: Subsistir

Warning.NoSkill: La acción Subsist se puede usar con diferentes habilidades y no se especificó ninguna habilidad. Esto normalmente usa Sociedad si estás en un asentamiento o Supervivencia si estás en la naturaleza.

Sustain.Description:
Choose one of your effects that has a sustained duration or lists a special benefit when you Sustain it. Most such effects come from spells or magic item activations. If the effect has a sustained duration, its duration extends until the end of your next turn. (Sustaining more than once in the same turn doesn't extend the duration to subsequent turns.) If an ability can be sustained but doesn't list how long, it can be sustained up to 10 minutes.

An effect might list an additional benefit that occurs if you Sustain it, and this can even appear on effects that don't have a sustained duration. If the effect has both a special benefit and a sustained duration, your Sustain action extends the duration as well as having the special benefit.

If your Sustain action is disrupted, the ability ends.
Sustain.Title: Sustain

Swim.Description:
You attempt an Athletics check to move a maximum distance of 10 feet through water. The GM determines the DC based on the turbulence or danger of the water; in most instances of calm water, you get an automatic critical success. If your land Speed is 40 feet or higher, increase the maximum possible distance by 5 feet for every 20 feet of Speed above 20 feet.

If you end your turn in water and haven't succeeded at a Swim action that turn, you sink 10 feet or get moved by the current, as determined by the GM. This doesn't apply if your last action on your turn was to enter the water.

Critical Success You move through the water, increasing the maximum distance by 5 feet.
Success You move through the water.
Critical Failure You make no progress. If you're holding your breath, you lose 1 round of air.

Notes.criticalFailure: Fallo crítico No progresas y, si contienes la respiración, pierdes 1 ronda de aire.
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico Te mueves a través del agua 10 pies, más 5 pies por cada 20 pies de tu Velocidad terrestre (un total de 15 pies para la mayoría de los PJ).
Notes.success: Éxito Te mueves a través del agua 5 pies, más 5 pies por cada 20 pies de tu Velocidad terrestre (un total de 10 pies para la mayoría de los PJ).

Swim.Title: Nadar

TakeCover.Description: You press yourself against a wall or duck behind an obstacle to take better advantage of cover. If you would have standard cover, you instead gain greater cover, which provides a +4 circumstance bonus to AC; to Reflex saves against area effects; and to Stealth checks to Hide, Sneak, or otherwise avoid detection. Otherwise, you gain the benefits of standard cover (a +2 circumstance bonus instead). This lasts until you move from your current space, use an attack action, become unconscious, or end this effect as a free action.
TakeCover.Title: Take Cover

Notes.criticalFailure: Falla crítica Su manipulación falla dramáticamente, creando una pequeña explosión de sus propias herramientas o equipo. Tomas [[/r (@actor.level)[fire] #Tamper Backfire]] {fire damage equal to your level} .
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico Tu manipulación es increíblemente efectiva. Si manipulaste un arma, el enemigo recibe una penalización de circunstancia de -2 a las tiradas de ataque y daño con esa arma. Si manipuló la armadura, la armadura obstaculiza el movimiento del enemigo, haciendo que el enemigo quede desprevenido e infligiendo una penalización de -10 pies a su velocidad. El efecto dura hasta que el enemigo interactúa para eliminarlo, sin importar cuál hayas usado. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.rzcpTJU9MvW1x1gz] {Effect: Armor Tampered With (Critical Success)} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.o7qm13OmaYOMwgib] {Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Critical Success)}
Notes.success: Éxito Su manipulación es temporalmente efectiva. Como éxito crítico, pero el efecto termina al comienzo de tu próximo turno, incluso si el enemigo no interactúa para terminarlo. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.IfRkgjyh0JzGalIy] {Effect: Armor Tampered With (Success)} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.4QWayYR3JSL9bk2T] {Effect: Weapon Tampered With (Success)}

Track.Description:
You follow tracks, moving at up to half your travel Speed. After a successful check to Track, you can continue following the tracks at half your Speed without attempting additional checks for up to 1 hour. In some cases, you might Track in an encounter. In this case, Track is a single action and doesn't have the exploration trait, but you might need to roll more often because you're in a tense situation. The GM determines how often you must attempt this check.

You attempt your Survival check when you start Tracking, once every hour you continue tracking, and any time something significant changes in the trail. The GM determines the DCs for such checks, depending on the freshness of the trail, the weather, and the type of ground.

Éxito You find the trail or continue to follow the one you're already following.
Fallo You lose the trail but can try again after a 1-hour delay.
Fallo crítico You lose the trail and can't try again for 24 hours.

Sample Track Tasks

No entrenado the path of a large army following a road

Entrenado relatively fresh tracks of a rampaging bear through the plains

Experto a nimble panther's tracks through a jungle, tracks obscured by rainfall

Maestro tracks obscured by winter snow, tracks of a mouse or smaller creature, tracks left on surfaces that can't hold prints like bare rock

Legendario old tracks through a windy desert's sands, tracks obscured by a major blizzard or hurricane

Notes.criticalFailure: Fallo crítico Pierdes el rastro y no puedes volver a intentarlo durante 24 horas.
Notes.failure: Fallo Pierde el rastro pero puede volver a intentarlo después de 1 hora de retraso.
Notes.success: Éxito Encuentras el rastro o sigues el que ya estás siguiendo.

SampleTasks.Untrained: the path of a large army following a road
SampleTasks.Trained: relatively fresh tracks of a rampaging bear through the plains
SampleTasks.Expert: a nimble panther's tracks through a jungle, tracks obscured by rainfall
SampleTasks.Master: tracks obscured by winter snow, tracks of a mouse or smaller creature, tracks left on surfaces that can't hold prints like bare rock
SampleTasks.Legendary: old tracks through a windy desert's sands, tracks obscured by a major blizzard or hurricane

Track.Title: Pista

TreatDisease.Description:
You spend at least 8 hours caring for a diseased creature. Attempt a Medicine check against the disease's DC. After you attempt to Treat a Disease for a creature, you can't try again until after that creature's next save against the disease.

Éxito crítico You grant the creature a +4 circumstance bonus to its next saving throw against the disease.
Éxito You grant the creature a +2 circumstance bonus to its next saving throw against the disease.
Fallo crítico Your efforts cause the creature to take a –2 circumstance penalty to its next save against the disease.

Notes.criticalFailure:
Fallo crítico Tus esfuerzos hacen que la criatura reciba una penalización de -2 de circunstancia en su siguiente salvación contra la enfermedad.
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.5oYKYXAexr0vhx84] {Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Failure)}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.id20P4pj7zDKeLmy] {Effect: Treat Disease (Critical Success)}
Notes.success:
Éxito Otorgas a la criatura un bonificador de circunstancia de +2 en su próxima tirada de salvación contra la enfermedad.
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Ee2xfKX1yyqGIDZj] {Effect: Treat Disease (Success)}

TreatDisease.Title: Tratar la enfermedad

TreatPoison.Description:
You treat a patient to prevent the spread of poison. Attempt a Medicine check against the poison's DC. After you attempt to Treat a Poison for a creature, you can't try again until after the next time that creature attempts a save against the poison.

Éxito crítico You grant the creature a +4 circumstance bonus to its next saving throw against the poison.
Éxito You grant the creature a +2 circumstance bonus to its next saving throw against the poison.
Fallo crítico Your efforts cause the creature to take a –2 circumstance penalty to its next save against the poison.

Notes.criticalFailure:
Fallo crítico Tus esfuerzos hacen que la criatura reciba una penalización de -2 de circunstancia en su siguiente salvación contra el veneno.
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.ESuBosh3t1pXEcBj] {Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Failure)}
Notes.criticalSuccess:
Éxito crítico Otorgas a la criatura un bonificador de circunstancia de +4 en su próxima tirada de salvación contra el veneno.
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.XwCBalKJf3CiEiFa] {Effect: Treat Poison (Critical Success)}
Notes.success:
Éxito Otorgas a la criatura un bonificador de circunstancia de +2 en su próxima tirada de salvación contra el veneno.

TreatPoison.Title: Tratar veneno

TreatWounds.Content: Seleccione un DC de destino. Recuerda que no puedes intentar una curación por encima de tu competencia. Intentar hacerlo reducirá la CD y la cantidad curada al máximo que seas capaz de hacer.
TreatWounds.Error: Token {name} no tiene la habilidad de medicina
TreatWounds.Label: Tratar heridas

Trip.Description:
Intentas derribar a una criatura al suelo. Intenta una prueba de Atletismo contra la CD de Reflejos del objetivo.

Éxito crítico El objetivo cae y cae boca abajo y recibe 1d6 daños contundentes.
Éxito El objetivo cae y aterriza boca abajo.
Fallo crítico Pierdes el equilibrio y caes y aterrizas boca abajo.

Notes.criticalFailure: Falla crítica Pierdes el equilibrio y caes y aterrizas @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60] {Prone} .
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico El objetivo cae y aterriza @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60] {Prone} y ​​recibe [[/r 1d6[bludgeoning] # Bludgeoning damage]] {1d6} daño contundente.
Notes.success: Éxito El objetivo cae y aterriza @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60] {Prone} .

Trip.Title: Viaje

TumbleThrough.Description:
You Stride up to your Speed. During this movement, you can try to move through the space of one enemy. Attempt an Acrobatics check against the enemy's Reflex DC as soon as you try to enter its space. You can Tumble Through using Climb, Fly, Swim, or another action instead of Stride in the appropriate environment.

Éxito You move through the enemy's space, treating the squares in its space as difficult terrain (every 5 feet costs 10 feet of movement). If you don't have enough Speed to move all the way through its space, you get the same effect as a failure.
Fallo Your movement ends, and you trigger reactions as if you had moved out of the square you started in.

Notes.failure: Fallo Tu movimiento finaliza y desencadenas reacciones como si te hubieras movido fuera de la casilla en la que comenzaste.
Notes.success: Éxito Te mueves a través del espacio del enemigo, tratando las casillas en su espacio como terreno difícil (cada 5 pies cuesta 10 pies de movimiento). Si no tienes suficiente Velocidad para moverte completamente a través de su espacio, obtienes el mismo efecto que un fallo.

TumbleThrough.Title: Caer a través

Notes.criticalFailure: Critical Failure No lanzas la criatura, y ya no está @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei] {Grabbed} o @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM] {Restrained} por ti.
Notes.criticalSuccess: Éxito crítico Lanzas a la criatura a la distancia deseada y cae @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60] {Prone} .
Notes.failure: Fallo No arrojas la criatura.
Notes.success: Éxito Lanzas a la criatura la distancia deseada.
